Title: Proper Account Setup and Safety
Content: To start on Xiaohongshu, it's crucial to have a safe and secure account. Ensure your device and network are clean, meaning they haven't been flagged for previous violations. Avoid frequently switching between multiple accounts on the same device. Use a new device and a new phone number if necessary. Register your account and avoid linking too many social media accounts initially. This helps prevent the platform from flagging your account as suspicious. If you have an old account that hasn't been used for violations, you can use it to start. However, avoid using virtual numbers or multiple account logins on the same device, as these can lead to low traffic or account restrictions. Ensure your phone number can receive SMS for verification purposes.

Title: Determining Your Content Strategy Based on Monetization
Content: Your content strategy on Xiaohongshu should be determined by your monetization method. There are two primary ways to monetize: selling products or services and accepting advertisements. If you are selling products, focus on creating content that attracts your target customers. This includes showcasing your products, sharing customer testimonials, solving customer problems, and showing your daily work routine. For those accepting advertisements, the goal is to generate high traffic. Create engaging content that attracts a broad audience, such as tutorials, reviews, or lifestyle vlogs. Consistency is key; aim to post regularly and maintain a steady flow of content. This helps build your audience and attract potential advertisers. Remember, the type of content you create should align with your monetization strategy to maximize effectiveness.

Title: Avoiding Common Pitfalls and Ensuring Consistency
Content: Consistency and avoiding common pitfalls are essential for success on Xiaohongshu. First, avoid frequently deleting old content, as this can flag your account as suspicious. Instead, hide any content you no longer want to display. Ensure your account is verified with accurate information, and avoid using multiple accounts on the same device. Consistency in posting is crucial; aim to post at least one piece of content daily and strive to reach 100 posts. This helps build your presence and improve your skills. Avoid using virtual numbers or multiple logins on the same device, as these can lead to low traffic or account restrictions. Lastly, ensure your phone number can receive SMS for verification purposes. By following these guidelines, you can build a strong and consistent presence on Xiaohongshu.
